SELECT * FROM TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE JOIN tl_c_company_info ON TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE.COMPANY_PK = tl_c_company_info.COMPANY_PK JOIN tl_c_company_category ON tl_c_company_category.COMPANY_CATEGORY_PK = tl_c_company_info.COMPANY_CATEGORY_PK WHERE TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE.COMPANY_PK IN ( SELECT COMPANY_PK FROM TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE WHERE TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(APPLYING_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(APPLYING_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_c_student_applying VALUES( tl_c_student_applying_seq.nextval, #{internship_course_pk}, #{student_pk}, '신청완료', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE a JOIN tl_c_company_info b ON a.COMPANY_PK = b.COMPANY_PK JOIN tl_c_student_applying c ON c.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK = a.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK WHERE STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT * FROM TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE JOIN tl_c_company_info ON TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE.COMPANY_PK = tl_c_company_info.COMPANY_PK JOIN tl_c_student_applying ON tl_c_student_applying.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK = TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK WHERE STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk} AND TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE.COMPANY_PK = tl_c_company_info.COMPANY_PK AND tl_c_student_applying.STATUS != '신청완료'
SELECT CASE WHEN STATUS !='신청완료' THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END AS record_exists FROM ( SELECT * FROM tl_c_student_applying c WHERE STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC )WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
